root.name: Petz Dolphinz Encounter
root.description: In this entry in Ubisoft's seminal Petz franchise, players engage in a variety of mini-games involving aquatic life such as sea lionz, killer whalez, and the titular dolphinz while attempting to ameliorate the effects of an oil spill.Noted film critic and New York socialite Alex Navarro once referred to it as "something that exists, apparently."
